parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3
</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>0.56
</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Artillery

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns ETA to the target in seconds for given artillery unit based on target position and used magazine, -1 if target can't be hit.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> unit '''getArtilleryETA''' [targetPosition, magazineType]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]] - artillery unit

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> targetPosition: [[Position]] - position of the target

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> magazineType: [[String]] - type of magazine used

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_mortar [[getArtilleryETA]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[[getPos]] _target, [[getArtilleryAmmo]] [_mortar] [[select]] 0];</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_mortar [[getArtilleryETA]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[[position]] _target, [[currentMagazine]] _mortar];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[getArtilleryAmmo]], [[commandArtilleryFire]], [[doArtilleryFire]], [[enableEngineArtillery]], [[getArtilleryComputerSettings]], [[shownArtilleryComputer]], [[inRangeOfArtillery]]
</value></part></template>

<dl class='command_description'>
<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment><dd class="notedate">Posted on August 26, 2013</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:Killzone_Kid|Killzone_Kid]]</dt>
<dd class="note">To avoid wrong ETA readings, position of the target should only be obtained via [[position]] or [[getPos]]
<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl></root>
